subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: As the United States team arrived in Costa Rica for a game Friday, resentment was evident over a match in the snow in Colorado last March that prompted a protest.
snippet: As the United States team arrived in Costa Rica for a game Friday, resentment was evident over a match in the snow in Colorado last March that prompted a protest.
